strings.string: Profile Management (save/load display to profile number)
Profile Activation Days (of week 1-7, e.g. 456 or 71 or 1234567)
Profile Start Time [Sunrise+-] HH:MM (activate from this time)
Profile End Time [Sunset+-] HH:MM (activate until this time)
Gesture Profile (0 for none, or profile number for gesture)
Profile Block Random (while this profile is active, block random events)
Profile Random Events (number per day for this profile)
Demo Profiles (cycle profiles in specified range, if no other profile active)
Demo Profiles Start And End (e.g. 25-99 for preset profiles)
